title: URASHAKA INSHUTI?
content:
**URASHAKA INSHUTI? UBWO RERO BERA ABANDI INSHUTI NZIZA** 

Inshuti zituma ubuzima bushimisha kurushaho kandi zigasangira umuzigo w' ibibazo zifite. Umubare w’inshuti ufite si wo w’ingenzi. Icy’ingenzi ni uko ukubera inshuti nziza abantu ukunda. Hari uburyo burenga miriyoni bwo kuba inshuti nziza! Dore bumwe muri bwo:

 - Itegeko ry’ingenzi ngenderwaho ni ugutekereza ku cyo ushaka kandi unakeneye ku nshuti – nawe uzikorera ibyo ushaka ko zigukorera. 
 - Tega amatwi inshuti zawe kandi wubahe ibitekerezo by’abandi – nubwo ibitekerezo byabo byaba bitandukanye n’ibyawe.
 - Emera inshuti zawe uko zimeze. Inshuti nziza ntizijora buri kanya inshuti zabo cyangwa ngo zigerageze kuzihindura. Ishimire inshuti zawe uko zaba zimeze kose kandi uzifate uko nawe wifuza ko zagufata.
 - Gira umutima mwiza kandi urangwe no kugira imbabazi.  Ishyire mu mwanya w’inshuti yawe – twese dukora amakosa.
 - Ba uwo kwizerwa. Bivuze ko ukora icyo wasezeranyije umuntu kandi ntuzigere na rimwe uhemukira inshuti yawe. Kwirinda kumena amabanga inshuti zawe zakubwiye, keretse igihe ziri mu byago. Igihe ziri mu byago kandi zikeneye ubufasha, washaka umuntu mukuru wizera ukabimubwira.

**Inshuti ni ingenzi ku buryo bw'umwihariko. Ni abantu bazagutega amatwi banakubikire ibanga. Ariko kumenya uko waba inshuti nziza buri gihe si ko byoroshye. Iyi nkuru ni inkuru y’umukobwa umwe**
